```py
>>> lst = ['a', 'a', 'b']
>>> ser = pd.Series([1, 2, np.nan], index=lst)
>>> ser
a    1.0
a    2.0
b    NaN
dtype: float64
>>> ser.groupby(level=0).count()
a    2
b    0
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> data = [[1, np.nan, 3], [1, np.nan, 6], [7, 8, 9]]
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["a", "b", "c"],
...                   index=["cow", "horse", "bull"])
>>> df
 a         b     c
cow     1       NaN     3
horse   1       NaN     6
bull    7       8.0     9
>>> df.groupby("a").count()
 b   c
a
1   0   2
7   1   1 
```
